s.text: 2. Which explanation did NATO spokesman David Wilby give for the attack that killed 10 civilians in a residential area of Pristina last week?
b) "Relax, it's not like we hit a convoy of refugees or anything."
c) Less "Greek, Hungarian, Italian and French," more "British and American."
